Package com.attivio.sdk.search.fields

Class BinaryFieldExpression

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.attivio.sdk.search.fields.FieldExpression
      • com.attivio.sdk.search.fields.BinaryFieldExpression
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BinaryMathExpression, Compare, DateAdd, DateDiff
    public abstract class BinaryFieldExpression
extends FieldExpression
    Abstract FieldExpression that takes two FieldExpressions as arguments.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
